idea:
Established in 2014, Miracle Digital provides its customers with the latest technology and consumer electronic products. Mr. Irshad . Ahmed . Siddiqui is the founders of the company who had a vision to go beyond the final frontier of innovation to constantly evolve with the latest offerings of lifestyle products and gadgets.
We promise to continuously strive for improvement, remain committed to quality and give better service to our customers. We do a lot of research and carefully shortlist and add new products in our portfolio.
Our portfolio comprise of smart mobility solutions, multimedia products, wearable fitness device, 3D pocket projectors, digital photo frames, augmented reality and virtual reality headsets.
We span across India from Delhi, Jamshedpur, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Hyderabad, Bangalore , Chennai. Our retail outlets are available with LFRs like Croma, Landmark, Snehanjali, Hyper City ( future group).
Customer buys our product through both online and offline channels. Our strong offline network includes vast number of distributors and retailers across the country ( Delhi. Mumbai, Bangalore, Pune ).
name: miracle digital

idea:
We would like to introduce ourselves as one of the fastest growing companies in Corporate Hospitality Sector. The company started operations in November 2014 and has grown steadily to establish itself as one of the leading companies in India as corporate stay solutions providers.

Serviced Apartments is our niche and USP and we are the only company in India to specialise exclusively in service apartments. We are registered vendors with several companies like Axis Bank, TCS, Pricewater Cooper, Deloitte, ITC, L&T, Pizza Hut, TATA AIG etc. We provide best quality service apartments in cities like Mumbai, Pune, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Delhi, Chennai and Kolkata.

Website : www.pajasa.com
name: PAJASA STAY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are working in a New Manner of Advertising,Event Catering,Market Research,Postal & Courier Service,Public Opinion Polling
name: Shree Samarth Krupa Enterprise

idea:
PenguinApps is an IT consulting and solution provider of next-gen business collaborate with customers throughout the world. With exceptional experience, comprehensive intelligence system across diverse industries and domains, we work with customers to turn them into some of the most successful and high-performance Organizations.
Incepted in 2015, PenguinApps is headquartered in Mumbai. The commitment to quality and the spirit to innovate has made us serve many clients across Mumbai(India), Germany and US
name: PenguinApps
